website_summaries.verdict: This extra-large golf umbrella is available in several sizes (54", 62", and 68") and a variety of colors.
pros: We love the double-layered windproof design
Large enough to fit at least 2 adults
Quality nonslip handle of solid rubber
Easy to open and close with one hand
cons: A few buyers have reported faulty handles, but this seems to be rare

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, Sturdy Build!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice umbrella. Was looking for something that could hold up to the rainy season of Florida. This definaltey did the Job. Seems very well made, has a nice cover with strap as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rgman1

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Here at California this year we had lot of rain, i already went through 2 umbrellas from homedepots. Cheap and bad wuality, thats when we got this one. Was really impressed with the quality of the product. The joins are sturdy and it holds well in high wind as well. Definitely worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Huzaifa

customer_reviews.title: Large, simple, exactly as you'd expect
customer_reviews.text: I was in the market for a big umbrella after my last Ping tour one started to lose its integrity. I picked this one up and it's pretty much as advertised. I wouldn't call it the sturdiest umbrella I've ever used at this size, and the handle arrived with a few chips in the rubber straight out of the package, but overall I'm pretty happy with it. In particular I like that the handle is rubber rather than the foam stuff you'll find on umbrellas from time to time.
customer_reviews.author: David Wynn

customer_reviews.title: Very Quality Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: I've bought many umbrellas in the past but this umbrella has worked great. It has been raining a lot recently and this has held up to large storms. The slits to let wind through help ensure this umbrella wont break. The materials are very strong and rugged and have dealt with me throwing it around.
customer_reviews.author: Renita J. Bess

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a wedding for the bride and groom. In Central Park while it was down pouring. Very durable. Wish I brought one for every member of bridal party. It is the umbrella on the right hand side.
customer_reviews.author: LEgo dad

customer_reviews.title: Best umbrella I have had yet!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, I have used this a few times, and its has held up, where I live, it is usually pretty windy, and has held up in windy conditions, no turning out. Because it is so big it can cover two, although I work for school district and needed to cover my backpack, which is why I wanted a big one. it is big it is bulky, but the carrying case helps to keep the bulkiness in when carrying it. My only concern is the durability and the lightening rod aspect. Will update if I have problems, but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Phillipa

customer_reviews.title: Light rain only
customer_reviews.text: Umbrella almost immediately inverts in wind greater than 5mph. The windproofing does serve a purpose, letting a slow trickle of water drip on you under the canopy. Umbrella is lightweight and does look nice. Unfortunately staying dry is more important than looks in this instance. Would not recommend it to anyone that's going to be out in anything harder than a light summer shower.
customer_reviews.author: Mike J M

customer_reviews.title: LOVE! Huge canopy and comfortable handle.
customer_reviews.text: I love this umbrella! It fits several people under the huge canopy. The handle is super comfortable to hold. It comes with a little carrying sleeve with a shoulder strap. It seems to be well made and that it will last! I never thought I would get excited about an umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: fdrnet

customer_reviews.title: Falls Apart
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 62" umbrella for my son on 6/26. He's not really one to golf in the rain so he's only used it a couple of times. Today we got caught in a pretty heavy rain and the handle and the tip of the umbrella came right off of the shaft. Either inferior adhesive is used or not enough is used.
customer_reviews.author: bmsguy

customer_reviews.title: Plastic (??) tip on the umbrella arrived broken, out of the box - and plastic, really?
customer_reviews.text: Umbrella has arrived today, with its tip split, and separated from the stem of the umbrella - out of the box. Fault may be Heasy’s or Amazon’s, but this leads me to considerable skepticism about the wisdom of putting a fairly cheap-looking plastic tip on a part of the umbrella that is likely to come into repeated contact with the ground. I am much less pleased with this purchase than I was 2 days ago. Return is on the way.....
customer_reviews.author: northxnortheast

customer_reviews.title: Best umbrella I've ever seen!
customer_reviews.text: I use a mobility scooter to get around and occasionally get caught in the summer "pop up" thunderstorms. The normal size golf umbrellas I used always left room for the rain to creep in somewhere. The size of this umbrella (I got the 68 inch) is wonderful! It protects a greater area and can withstand the wind, etc. The build quality is excellent. I would definitely reorder this in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: D. Willemin

customer_reviews.title: Maybe larger than you expect use caution if you decide to open it in your kitchen like I did!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a fantastic umbrella with the wet winter we’ve had. Although advertised as a golf umbrella this is a perfect umbrella for a mom with many small children. Going from the car to the grocery store through the reigning parking lot you can cover your self as well as your family and your entire cart of belongings. It does get heavy after some time but will keep you very dry. Maybe larger than you expect use caution if you decide to open it in your kitchen like I did!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy oversized umbrella
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this umbrella to have one that is big enough for both of us going out. It definitely provides significantly more coverage than the average umbrella. I can tell the material is of good quality, and it opens and closes easily. If you’re looking for an oversized umbrella this is a great one.
customer_reviews.author: Bezli

customer_reviews.title: good but expensive
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality umbrella. However, if you live in the USA, you can easily buy a Totes brand umbrella for the same size and style at a Walmart or Staples. I paid $29 plus tax for this umbrella on Amazon. Walmart has Totes for $15 and Staples has them for $20. The one at Staples seems to be slightly better build quality.
customer_reviews.author: Pasquale

customer_reviews.title: Big and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is so awesome. The quality is really great. Once you open it up you can feel how sturdy it is. You know it won't blow up in strong winds. You could probably fit at least 4 people under it comfortably. It is super easy to open and close.
customer_reviews.author: R T B

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and durable material
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality durable product. I wanted to buy an umbrella that can withstand wind. This has strong metal frame and is able to stand very well. The click button works very well. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Hakim Moazam

customer_reviews.title: Nice big umbrella
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is nice and big and keeps you dry while walking i use it to walk to the train station on rainy days and i use it again when i return from work on rainy nights well worth the money you pay for it.
customer_reviews.author: The Vin Man

customer_reviews.title: Feel like a boss strolling through Lowe's!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice umbrella. It feels well built and is a bit heavier, but I prefer that to the typical "el cheapo" umbrella feel. It also comes with a strapped sleeve for carrying....I prefer to go Geralt of Rivia style with a crossdraw across the back. Looks cool, feels cool...at least in my mind!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer support
customer_reviews.text: Main use is to protect me from the sun and rain when I am golfing. The handle is a bit longer than my previous umbrellas (about inch)but still fit on my umbrella holder on my golf cart. It’s large canopy definitely protected me from the sun. Within a month my umbrella developed a slight minor hole which developed into a larger hole. I sent an email to heasy support explaining my issue and within about 3 weeks I received my replacement umbrella. I definitely would recommend this umbrella not only because it is a good product but the excellent customer support.
customer_reviews.author: lucky

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have a smaller umbrella holder on my cart, 1 1/2 inch diameter so I was concerned the handle would be too big but it fits nicely. The umbrella opens easily and the covers slips back on without problems. Can't wait to try it.
customer_reviews.author: MMH

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Great Umbrella. The quality is AMAZING and it is super large. The carrying case is top notch and adds a level of comfort when carrying it around. It is easy to use and easy to open when the rain starts. You are protected with this!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn M.

customer_reviews.title: Best investment this year
customer_reviews.text: Very nice build, sturdy, and very wide area. Me my son and his bus helper all fit under it with room to spare. Would recommend at this point in time, no issues with it like others have stated.
customer_reviews.author: P. Perry

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful durable large size umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful large size umbrella and everything as listed and describe it) Amazing size good quality was additional porch for storage and beautiful colors accurate meet and greet for our door during the sun or rain
customer_reviews.author: Adesignstore

customer_reviews.title: It's worth the money paid.
customer_reviews.text: I live in the East Coast, and rain usually comes with a strong wind. Small umbrellas are easily broken, and you get easily wet. This umbrella won't easily give up with the winds and can give shade to two people. Materials used seems to be of good quality so would last for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Upahar J

customer_reviews.title: Great Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: This is a great large umbrella! It's feel better made than other ones I've had. I only gave 4 stars because there is glue all over the handle and a scratch on the button. Otherwise, it's amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality item
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used the umbrella a few times but I’m so impressed by the build quality that I’ve order a second one for our motorhome.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Good umbrella. Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: sturdy construction; automatic opening is good; good material and size is good ---not excessively big but gives good cover for two.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Romine

customer_reviews.title: big and strong
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased three of these umbrellas because they are big and actually keep you dry and they are strong in most wind.
customer_reviews.author: Boston

customer_reviews.title: Gigantic! Easy to prop up
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge! I didn't think it would be as large as I did when I bought it, but I'm glad it is. It works great when you need to cover a backpack on a rainy day. It's also pretty lightweight and props up easily.
customer_reviews.author: N. George

customer_reviews.title: It's an umbrella, nothing that wows me.
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is vented at the top, but I could have bought a non vented one at my local home depot for $5. It's not a bad umbrella but nothing special either.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Classic
customer_reviews.text: This classic umbrella will protect you from the elements and it has yet to invert while I am walking. It is quite wide so be mindful of your surroundings........and other people.
customer_reviews.author: Specter Scepter

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Great umbrella. I was looking for an umbrella that was large and sturdy and this one was just right.
customer_reviews.author: William Thorpe

customer_reviews.title: Big Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: This is a big umbrella which is what I wanted. Haven't used it yet, so I don't know on the durability.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Reinehr

customer_reviews.title: it's huge !
customer_reviews.text: Wow- it is way bigger than I presumed it would be.....but it will definitely keep the rain away !
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: HUGE
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is huge! Can definitely fit more than one person under it and stay dry!
customer_reviews.author: jennykat

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: Great umbrella it's hard to find 64" windproof umbrella in my area. Keeps my entire outfit dry. Edit: I used it on a string windy day the umbrella is strong
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: NOT windproof!!!
customer_reviews.text: The FIRST time I used this product in any kind of wind it blew inside out, all of the metal became bent and one hinge broke. Of course it's outside the "return window" so all that can be done is to discourage purchasing the produdt.
customer_reviews.author: strat70

customer_reviews.title: perfect!  !!  ...
customer_reviews.text: perfect! !! ... bought these for my bridal party at my daughter's wedding. Large size can accommodate two people at a time.
customer_reviews.author: GSC

customer_reviews.title: its huge but nice
customer_reviews.text: big umbrella you can have more than one person under it for sure seems sturdy as well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the over size
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted, I like big umbrellas and this fits the bill!
customer_reviews.author: William Quirk

customer_reviews.title: Staying dry.
customer_reviews.text: Have not used it enough to really give an oppinion yet.
customer_reviews.author: B J Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I’m happy with the automatic unfolding button. Looks and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Happybowser2026

customer_reviews.title: Durable, plenty of coverage, lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: Love this umbrella!! It covers all of me and my loved one without getting wet from the rain. I've been looking for one like this at an,affordable price for a longtime! I 'm glad I purchased it. I recommend it highly to anyone that wants to stay dry or out of the sun.
customer_reviews.author: John D Bautista

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Love it haven't tried it in rain but it works and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I use it for golf on my pushcart several times per week. It needs to be anchored down in the umbrella holder or it will come flying out when a gust of wind hits it, which is not unusual. Quality is reasonable for the price. I would buy it again although I hope I don't have to.
customer_reviews.author: Laurence Breslow

customer_reviews.title: Extra large umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Good sized umbrella for fitting more than one person or for golfing. I like the button that opens the umbrella automatically, though you do have to manually close it. It also comes with a handy carrying sleeve for easy transport.
customer_reviews.author: RRM

customer_reviews.title: Best Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my BEST Amazon purchases. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Ronte Keys

customer_reviews.title: Pleased so far...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had a chance to use it in the rain yet, but did open it up, handle it, and I think it's going to work quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is awesome-lightweight, easy to open and close, large enough for me and kids, and shakes off excess water easily.
customer_reviews.author: ShopalotDotcom

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I wish it had a curved handle to hold better and be able to hook into something
customer_reviews.author: LINDA STANLEY

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction!
customer_reviews.text: Plastic tip fell off right out off the box. There was just a little bit of dried glue that did not hold. I had to go to the hardware store and get some better adhesive for it to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Deal

customer_reviews.title: Big lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I like that is not heavy and covers me well on the rain and stable when it's windie.
customer_reviews.author: Mariiel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a windy day
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect umbrella for a rainy windy day. Have owned several umbrellas before and they could not survive the strong winds. My only complain will be that sometimes you have to push the holder hard to close the umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great size!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size loving it and the $ was great. Cost more for the same crapy smaller ones at the stores.
customer_reviews.author: Debby Stace

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: No complaints, protects myself and my kids from the rain at the bus stop.
customer_reviews.author: Amy E. Sutherland

customer_reviews.title: Get the 68 inch
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for another big umbrella since my last one was taken after leaving it at work. This one fits the bill completely. Lightweight, sturdy and most importantly keeps you dry! The 68” was big enough to keep myself and two clients dry.
customer_reviews.author: Montrell B

customer_reviews.title: Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for a friend and she loves it. She said it is the best umbrella she has ever owned. Very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Rita Casey

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, large umbrella-perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is amazing!! It’s big enough to protect us all from the heat and sun. It’s also lightweight, folds up nicely and stores super easily! We’ve used it soo much already! We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Wide umbrella, will cover you and your clubs.
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it one time, today. My reviews are based on my one time use.
customer_reviews.author: JaniceG

customer_reviews.title: If you live in Oklahoma, you want one of these.
customer_reviews.text: Where I live is treacherous on umbrellas. High winds destroyed 5 umbrellas before I bought this one. It holds up to high wind exceptionally well. Luckily it has a wrist strap.
customer_reviews.author: Leland Massey

customer_reviews.title: Nicer than expected for $21
customer_reviews.text: Quality umbrella for the price. Construction is sturdy. Roomy too. I recommend without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Large enough to cover 2+
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Keeps me and my little one out of the rain!
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Faircloth

customer_reviews.title: Stay dry
customer_reviews.text: This is a great umbrella for rainy soccer games. Glad I was able to get it in our high school colors.
customer_reviews.author: Dyke Family

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Have only used once since purchased and it was as described. Perfect for the occasional showers.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Big umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Super cute big umbrella and can be used for more than 1 person.
customer_reviews.author: Just ok

customer_reviews.title: Great Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Its rainy season here in south florida, so you better be prepared with a very large umbrella. This one definately fits the bill and large enough for two people
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella
customer_reviews.text: This is the umbrella I've been looking for forever! It's huge and very lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this umbrella for 2 weeks but so far it's worked great. I love the size of this umbrella, it's exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Heather W

customer_reviews.title: Faulty handle
customer_reviews.text: Received this on April 1st and in a little over a month, dropped it while carrying it and the handle broke.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Fain

customer_reviews.title: Effective umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Keeps me dry, doesn't blow away. It does appropriate umbrella work.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: High quality golf umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for those rainy soccer games! Sturdy, large, and easy push button to open and close.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Tupa

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a great umbrella this is really going to help me walk to work
customer_reviews.author: Marco M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in size.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase. The umbrella is very light weight, very big in size enough to cover 2/3 ppl. Will re order another umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia H.

customer_reviews.title: Absolute must have for anyone wanting a quality umbrella!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a good sturdy umbrella for a while. I had one and someone ripped it at work. So on the hunt I went to find a new one. I had several in my cart but finally chose the 68" Heasy brand. Boy am I glad I did! I explain in the video about how sturdy this one really is. But it's a full fiberglass frame, push button to open, and has a storage bag that it slides in to when not in use. I highly reccomend getting one of these if you want a quality umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Merick1207

product_meta.title: Heasy Golf Umbrella 58/62/68 Inch Large Windproof Waterproof Oversize Double Canopy Extra Sturdy Automatic Stick Umbrellas for Men & Women
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Package Dimensions :43.5 x 3 x 3 inches; 1.95 Pounds
 * Date First Available :January 9, 2019
 * Manufacturer :Heasy
 * ASIN :B07MQCMS2J

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #12,819 in Sports & Outdoors (See Top 100 in Sports & Outdoors)  *  #5 inSports Fan Golf Umbrellas 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.6 out of 5 stars224 ratings
feature_bullets: High Quality Golf Umbrellas : Heasy 54/62/68-inch Automatic Opening Large Size Golf Umbrella with 7 colors, satisfy your multiple choices and easily cope with weather changes. It is an ideal choice for most golfers, business people or people in daily life.

Double Canopy Construction : Double canopy design and fiberglass frame will ensure that your umbrella is windproof. The top is made of super waterproof, anti-collapse and lightweight high-tech fabric. Can dry quickly and protect against sun. The shaft and ribs are made of fiberglass will not crack or break easily and have sufficient flexibility.

Multiple Protection: The double-layer canopy design and the precise vent size design can protect you from natural impact, and can protect you from strong wind, ultraviolet rays, snow, heavy rain or sunlight. Enough to hold two people when opened.

Automatic Open Umbrella: The high-quality EVA grip further improves the grip comfort and control ability. The firm and comfortable handle allows you to open it by just pressing the button on the handle.

Safe to Use：The exquisite double canopy design, with a light but strong fiberglass frame, makes the golf umbrellas flexible and durable. Product is not satisfied, contact us to get worry-free service.
